Quench their thirst and boost impulse sales at your snack bar, buffet, or fast food restaurant with this Cecilware Arctic Economy 20/3PE four bowl 5.4 gallon... More
Your customers are parched! Quench their thirst and boost impulse sales at your snack bar, buffet, or fast food restaurant with this Cecilware Arctic Economy 20/3PE four bowl 5.4 gallon premix cold beverage dispenser. At only 28 1/2" wide, this 4 bowl premix cold beverage dispenser features four 5.4 gallon refrigerated bowls for long-lasting refreshment while sacrificing minimal countertop space! With the ability to set the dispenser for fast or gentle agitation to accommodate fruit juice and dairy products, it is perfect for serving fruit juice, iced tea, iced coffee, and other refreshingly chilled drinks. The Cecilware Arctic Economy 20/4PE beverage dispenser's 1/7 hp compressor that uses R134A refrigerant will keep your beverages chilled and ready for consumption for hours at a time. It requires a 120V electrical connection and is UL and NSF Listed. Entertain this holiday in Personalized Style! We delicately etch the face of the Beverage Server with any single-letter monogram and name making it a unique gift for a special couple, family, or yourself! Perfect for serving punch, eggnog or any special holiday drink for those holiday gatherings!Our generously sized beverage server includes the server with lid and stand. Glass Beverage Server stands 21" inches tall. Holds up to 1 1/2 gallons of beverage. Metal stands 8" tall x 7 1/2" in diameter. Hand Wash recommended. Each beverage server is hand-crafted with subtle markings inherent to glass products made by hand. These markings add to the uniqueness of the gift. No two are exactly alike. Perfect for parties, holiday gifts and so much more!Note: Due to size this item ships separately from all other items ordered. A shipping surcharge will be added to regular shipping. Give your guests a beautifully simple way to self-serve cool beverages at buffets and catered events with this Cal Mil 1282-3A 3 gallon square beverage dispenser! Made from lightweight and durable acrylic, this clear dispenser elegantly displays colorful punches, water, iced tea, and more. Each beverage dispenser features a removable ice chamber to keep your beverages cold, and securely sits upon a shining, stainless steel base. Its spigot is removable for easy cleaning. Whether tailgating before the big game, enjoying the game at home, or searching for the perfect gift,The Gamer Home Team Beverage Dispenserwill bring out the fanatic in you. The Gamer is the ultimate beverage dispenser for your game day parties. The replica helmet design and officially licensed team logos will show off your team spirit while enjoying a cold beverage on game days and throughout the year. The Gamer is great for tailgate parties, backyard barbeques, home use, and make great gifts for the sports fan that thought they had it all. Fill The Gamer with your favorite beveragepunch, soft drinks, iced tea, or any other cold beverage you want to enjoy before, during, and after the big game. This Crathco G-Cool C-1S-16 single bowl 5 gallon premix cold beverage dispenser combines functionality and style so that your customers will quickly be thirsting for a refill of your delicious fruit juice, iced tea, or iced coffee! This single bowl premix cold beverage dispenser is made of black plastic with alluring graphics on each side so that your beverage will draw interest from every angle! It features a patented Tri-Cool evaporator with a large 3 sided cooling surface that will refrigerate the 5 gallon bowl to keep drinks crisp and delicious at your snack bar, buffet, convenience store, or fast food restaurant. The Crathco G-Cool C-1S-16 beverage dispenser's 1/6 hp compressor uses R134A refrigerant that will keep your beverages chilled and ready for consumption for hours at a time. It requires a 120V electrical connection and is UL and NSF Listed. Dimensions Height: 26 1/2" Width: 12 1/2" Depth: 19 1/2" Also known as C1S16 and C 1S 16. ( In stock ) This beverage dispenser has 2 polycarbonate cylinders for dispensing drinks. The tabletop display has an ice chamber in each cylinder to keep liquids cold. This beverage dispenser also has... More
This beverage dispenser has 2 polycarbonate cylinders for dispensing drinks. The tabletop display has an ice chamber in each cylinder to keep liquids cold. This beverage dispenser also has 2 drip trays. The tabletop fixture holds a total of 3 gallons. This beverage dispenser is an elegant way to enhance beverage presentation. This beverage dispenser, also known as a juice display, comes with two polycarbonate cylinders that rest on top of the stainless steel base. We sell this beverage dispenser with an ice-chamber in the middle of each cylinder to keep contents cold without diluting the flavor. This beverage dispenser can hold up to 3 gallons of liquid total; each cylinder has a 1.5 gallon capacity. This juice holder, beverage dispenser is perfect for dispensing juices and chilled beverages of any kind. This juice holder, beverage dispenser has an easy dispense faucet. Beverages can be easily dispensed from the spring faucets without causing a mess on your countertops. We also provide the beverage dispenser with two drip trays to prevent messes on your countertops. The polished chrome finish and the elegant accent at the side of this beverage dispenser give it an upscale appearance for use in high-end food and beverage service establishments. A beverage dispenser, like juice containers and water dispensers, is great for use in hotels, breakfast bars, buffets, catering events and parties. Please Note: Do not attempt to freeze the ice chamber or use it as a drink dispenser. The ice-chamber is ONLY meant to hold ice to chill beverages. Fill the ice-chamber with cubed or crushed ice. Click here to view the Assembly Instructions! Dimensions: Overall Size: 22"w x 22-1/2"h x 13-3/4"d Hold Capacity: 3.1 Gallon Weight: 26 lbs.
